Component.Name: SPI
Component.Description: Serial peripheral interface. The serial peripheral interface (SPI) protocol supports half-duplex, full-duplex and simplex synchronous, serial communication with external devices. The interface can be configured as master and in this case it provides the communication clock (SCK) to the external slave device. The interface is also capable of operating in multimaster configuration.

SupportDevices.Device: STM32F302CB, STM32F302CC, STM32F302RB, STM32F302RC, STM32F302VB, STM32F302VC,STM32F303CB, STM32F303CC, STM32F303RB, STM32F303RC, STM32F303VB, STM32F303VC,STM32F313CC, STM32F313RC, STM32F313VC
